item.title: 中国仅存的几家建筑商之一在债务计划上出现转折
item.description: 中国开发商路劲基础设施有限公司（Road King Infrastructure Ltd.）正在暂停支付所有海外债务，这与几个月前该公司表示预计今年将有足够现金支付借款利息的说法大相径庭。【原文：Chinese developer Road King Infrastructure Ltd. is suspending all offshore debt payments, a reversal from a couple of months ago when it said it expected to have enough cash to pay interest on borrowings this year.】

item.title: Unite 将以 7.23 亿英镑收购竞争对手学生房东 Empiric
item.description: Unite Group Plc 同意收购竞争对手学生房东 Empiric Student Property Plc，交易价值约为 7.23 亿英镑（约合 9.81 亿美元），这是席卷英国房地产的整合浪潮的最新证据。【原文：Unite Group Plc agreed to buy rival student landlord Empiric Student Property Plc in a deal valuing the company at about £723 million ($981 million), the latest evidence of the wave of consolidation sweeping UK real estate.】

item.title: Centrica 和 ECP 斥资 15 亿英镑收购英国谷物液化天然气码头
item.description: Centrica Plc 和 Energy Capital Partners 同意从国家电网公司（National Grid Plc）手中收购英国格莱恩液化天然气终端，交易价值为 15 亿英镑（20 亿美元）。【原文：Centrica Plc and Energy Capital Partners agreed to purchase the Grain LNG terminal in the UK from National Grid Plc in a deal valued at £1.5 billion ($2 billion).】

item.title: 人工智能支出增加，英伟达合作伙伴鸿海利润攀升
item.description: 鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. posted a better-than-projected 27% rise in quarterly earnings, reflecting how AI demand is helping the Taiwanese company weather a moribund global consumer electronics market.】

item.title: 夏季气候转暖，嘉士伯上调盈利预期
item.description: 嘉士伯（Carlsberg A/S）将全年利润预期上调至上限，原因是该啤酒生产商受益于夏季温暖的天气和包括中国在内的高端啤酒需求回升。【原文：Carlsberg A/S nudged its full-year profit guidance to the upper end, as the brewer benefited from warm summer weather and a pickup in demand for premium beer including in China.】

item.title: 英国第二季度经济增长比预测快 0.3% (1)
item.description: 英国第二季度的经济表现好于预期，这让英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）松了一口气，但同时也提高了英国央行进一步降息的门槛。【原文：The UK economy fared better than expected in the second quarter, bringing some relief for Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves but raising the bar to further interest-rate cuts from the Bank of England.】

item.title: 标准银行利润创纪录，收费抵消贷款收入减少的影响
item.description: 非洲资产规模最大的银行--标准银行集团有限公司（Standard Bank Group Ltd.）报告称，由于手续费增长和交易收入帮助抵消了利息收入的放缓，上半年利润攀升至创纪录水平。【原文：Standard Bank Group Ltd., Africa’s biggest lender by assets, reported first-half profit climbed to a record as fee growth and trading revenue helped offset a slowdown in interest income.】

item.title: Hg 支持的软件公司 Visma 据称将选择银行进行首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，由 Hg 支持的 Visma 公司已经选定了几家银行，负责明年计划中的首次公开募股。【原文：Hg-backed Visma has picked banks to lead a planned initial public offering next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 客户面临贸易战压力，Adyen撤回增长展望
item.description: Adyen NV 表示，今年的净收入不太可能加速增长，原因是贸易战带来的宏观经济不确定性增加，对该荷兰公司处理的支付量造成了压力。【原文：Adyen NV said net revenue growth acceleration this year is unlikely, citing increased macroeconomic uncertainty from the trade war that is weighing on the volume of payments processed by the Dutch company.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国第二季度经济增长超预期
中国债券反弹加深，本地股反弹蓄势待发
item.description: 中国债券市场的抛售正在加速，超长期债券期货跌至四个月低点，而当地股市的牛市势头正在增强。【原文：A selloff in China’s bond market is accelerating, sending futures on ultra-long debt to a four-month low as a bull run in local stocks builds momentum.】

item.title: 将中东财富扩散到全球的 "巨型力量
item.description: 即使在冲突升级的同时，仍有数十亿美元流入或流出该地区。【原文：Even as conflict escalates, billions of dollars are flowing into and out of the region.】

item.title: 首尔房价增长再次放缓，为韩国央行降息铺平道路
item.description: 由于政府采取措施抑制房价过快上涨，韩国房地产市场有所降温，这为韩国央行考虑在本月晚些时候恢复降息周期提供了依据。【原文：South Korea’s property market cooled as government measures to rein in runaway prices curbed demand, bolstering the case for the Bank of Korea to consider resuming its rate-cut cycle later this month.】

item.title: 需求和价格疲软导致亏损加剧，蒂森克虏伯下调前景展望
item.description: 受需求低迷和价格下跌的影响，蒂森克虏伯公司第三季度亏损加剧，并下调了年度利润和收入预期。【原文：Thyssenkrupp AG lowered its annual profit and revenue guidance after posting a deeper third-quarter loss, hit by sluggish demand and falling prices.】

item.title: Origin 认为电动汽车和电池的蓬勃发展将推动虚拟发电厂的增长
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的电力零售商希望有更多的家庭将家用电池连接成 "虚拟发电厂"，它认为这种转变将抑制能源转型的成本，并缓解该国进展缓慢的电网建设压力。【原文：Australia’s biggest power retailer expects more households to link home batteries into “virtual power plants,” a shift it sees curbing the cost of the energy transition and easing pressure on the nation’s slow-moving grid build-out.】

item.title: 菲律宾中央银行命令电子钱包和支付应用程序删除在线赌博链接
item.description: 菲律宾中央银行已下令移动钱包、支付应用程序和其他受监管机构删除与在线赌博平台的链接。【原文：The Philippine central bank has ordered mobile wallets, payment applications and other supervised institutions to remove links to online gambling platforms.】

item.title: 中国钢铁产量数据公布前铁矿石连续第二日下跌
item.description: 在中国公布关键数据之前，铁矿石连续第二天下跌，这些数据应能更清楚地说明世界上最大的金属消费国削减钢铁生产的情况。【原文：Iron ore fell for a second day before the release of key Chinese data that should provide a clearer picture of curtailments to steel production in the world’s biggest metals consumer.】

item.title: 智囊团敦促中国在贸易紧张局势中加强人民币汇率
item.description: 美国和欧洲越来越多的经济学家和前官员都在敦促中国政府加强人民币汇率，并警告说长期低估人民币汇率可能会使贸易紧张局势升级，并扭曲中国的增长模式。【原文：A growing chorus of economists and former officials in the US and Europe is urging Beijing to strengthen the yuan, warning that prolonged undervaluation may escalate trade tensions and distort China’s growth model.】

item.title: 腾讯对人工智能的克制显示阿里巴巴与京东食品大战的风险
item.description: 中国最大的科技公司在经历了多年的困境之后，正在重新振作起来，雄心勃勃地要在从机器人、智能眼镜到廉价餐饮等各个方面占据主导地位。但投资者希望它们把支出重点放在人工智能领域。【原文：China’s biggest tech companies are bouncing back after years on the ropes with outsized ambitions to dominate in everything from robots and smart glasses to cheap meals. But investors want them to focus their spending where it counts — AI.】

item.title: 越南将降低银行接管弱势贷款人的准备金率
item.description: 越南将把兼并较弱贷款机构的银行的盾币存款准备金率减半，以促进国家金融业的整合。【原文：Vietnam will halve dong-denominated reserve ratios for banks that are taking over weaker lenders, as it promotes consolidation in the nation’s financial sector.】

item.title: 中国铜冶炼厂利润率短期缓解
item.description: 中国的铜冶炼厂在短期内从较高的费用中解脱出来，尽管利润率的提高可能不足以吸引它们提高产量。【原文：Chinese copper smelters are getting short-term relief from higher fees, although the improvement in profitability may not be enough to entice them into lifting production.】

item.title: 贝森特从哪里获得这些利率模型？
item.description:
它们与数十年来的规则和经验背道而驰。【原文：

They fly in the face of decades of rules and experience.

】

item.title: 英国面包连锁店 Greggs 增长乏力，空头大举入场
item.description: 由于这家英国连锁面包店难以让投资者相信开设更多门店会提振乏力的销售业绩，卖空者对 Greggs Plc 的押注达到了自全球金融危机以来从未有过的水平。【原文：Short sellers are betting against Greggs Plc at levels not seen since the global financial crisis, as the UK bakery chain struggles to convince investors that opening more shops will boost lackluster sales.】

item.title: 投资者聚焦土耳其通胀报告，寻找利率走向线索
item.description: 土耳其央行将于本周四公布其年底通胀预测，任何上调的幅度都将影响人们对利率走向的预期。【原文：Turkey’s central bank will announce its year-end inflation forecast on Thursday, with the magnitude of any upward revision set to shape expectations for the course of interest rates.】

item.title: 中国和印度就暂停五年后恢复边境贸易进行谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的新德里官员称，印度和中国正在讨论恢复时隔五年多的本地制造商品的边境贸易，这是亚洲邻国为缓和长期紧张关系所做的缓慢但稳步努力中的最新一步。【原文：India and China are discussing resuming border trade of locally made goods after more than five years, marking the latest step in a slow but steady effort by the Asian neighbors to ease long-standing tensions, according to officials in New Delhi familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 森那美寻求贷款为谷歌建设马来西亚数据中心
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，马来西亚开发商森那美地产公司（Sime Darby Property）正在与银行洽谈贷款事宜，贷款额度高达 30 亿林吉特（约合 7.14 亿美元），用于资助建设一个数据中心，该数据中心将租给谷歌。【原文：Malaysian developer Sime Darby Property is in talks with banks for a loan of as much as 3 billion ringgit ($714 million) to fund the building of a data center that will be leased to Google, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔下令对前部长之子遭注射器袭击事件进行 "透明 "调查
item.description: 马来西亚前部长拉菲兹-拉姆利（Rafizi Ramli）称，他的儿子周三下午在一家商场停车场遭到注射器袭击，马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）呼吁进行 "透明而迅速的调查"。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim has called for a “transparent and swift investigation” after former minister Rafizi Ramli said his son had been attacked with a syringe at a mall parking lot on Wednesday afternoon.】

item.title: 中国业务开始复苏，Jollibee 销售额创历史新高
item.description: 菲律宾顶级餐饮运营商 Jollibee Foods Corp. 表示，随着中国业务的复苏，第二季度销售额跃升至历史新高，有望实现扭亏为盈。【原文：Top Philippine restaurant operator Jollibee Foods Corp. said sales jumped to a record high in the second quarter as its China business recovered and looks set for a turnaround.】

item.title: 美国牛肉即将冲击伟大的澳式烧烤？
item.description:
本周彭博澳大利亚播客：美国牛肉禁令的结束对出口商和消费者意味着什么

？【原文：

This week on the Bloomberg Australia Podcast: What the end of the US beef ban means for exporters and consumers

】

item.title: 印度炼油厂纳亚拉诉诸海上转移燃料出口
item.description: 纳亚拉能源有限公司（Nayara Energy Ltd.）在受到欧盟制裁打击后装运的首批货物之一已被转移到另一艘海上油轮上，这证明这家印度炼油商正在努力继续出口燃料。【原文：One of the first cargoes shipped by Nayara Energy Ltd. after it was hit by EU sanctions has been transferred to another tanker at sea, evidence the Indian refiner is trying to keep exporting fuel.】
